entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
